Diane_Chase:
{{Use dmy dates|date=March 2020}} {{About|the musician|the anthropologist and archaeologist|Diane Zaino Chase}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Diane Chase | image = Diane_Chase.jpg | image_size = | caption = Diane Chase, November 2005 | origin = [[Sudbury, Ontario]], Canada | instrument = Vocals | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer | years_active = 2000–present | label = Spin | associated_acts = | website = }} '''Diane Chase''' is a Canadian [[country music]] artist. Chase has released three studio albums, 2000's ''In the Middle of Something'', 2004's ''The Ride'' and 2009's ''Gettin' There''. Her debut album produced two charting singles on the ''[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]'' Country Tracks chart in Canada, of which the highest was the No. 11-peaking title track.{{cite web|url=http://www.bac-lac.gc.ca/eng/discover/films-videos-sound-recordings/rpm/Pages/list.aspx?OCRText=Diane+Chase&ChartEn=Country+Singles&|title=Diane Chase - Country Singles|work=RPM|accessdate=February 27, 2023}} ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable" !
